County Clare is lighting up today with 8 ft @ 14s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph SE winds. Crab Island and Doolin Point are your top picks, offering clean conditions during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 13 ft @ 14s WSW with fresh 23 mph WSW winds, making it poor across the board. By the day after, things improve to 7 ft @ 12s W with light 7 mph SSE winds, perfect for a fun session at spots like Crab Island and Doolin Point. Best: today.
